api_key.comment: In order to use the map you need to have a google maps api key, find out more at https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key

heading_level.comment: The heading level, used for SEO. There should only be one h1 per page.

values.label: Socials
values.description: Icons with links for social media

logo.comment: Logo should be an SVG with size 48x48px
Logo should be an SVG with size 48x48px

autoplay.comment: Allows video to automatically start on page load. Please note: Video will autoplay if player controls are removed.

loop.comment: Allows video to loop playback. Please note: Will automatically loop if player controls are removed.

mute.comment: This parameter will automatically mute your video on load. Once your video plays, viewers can manually un-mute by clicking on the volume bar within the player. Please note: Will be muted if player controls are removed.

no_player_controls.comment: This parameter automatically disables all elements in the player (play bar, buttons, etc), autoplays, loops, and mutes your video on load. Please note: the background parameter is only supported for videos hosted by paid members.

autoplay.comment: Allows video to automatically start on page load. Please note: Video will autoplay if player controls are removed.

loop.comment: Allows video to loop playback. Please note: Will automatically loop if player controls are removed.

mute.comment: This parameter will automatically mute your video on load. Once your video plays, viewers can manually un-mute by clicking on the volume bar within the player. Please note: Will be muted if player controls are removed.

no_player_controls.comment: This parameter automatically disables all elements in the player (play bar, buttons, etc), autoplays, loops, and mutes your video on load. Please note: the background parameter is only supported for videos hosted by paid members.

heading_level.comment: The heading level, used for SEO. There should only be one h1 per page.

background_color.comment: This will overwrite the background color on all child accordions
